column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/82d96b07b5c2f6b357925ae714f5636e63ce966f for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

Adding the git calls to configure here for the bitcoin repository may make sense:
- git config githubmerge.repository bitcoin/bitcoin
- git config githubmerge.testcmd "make -j4 check" (adapt to whatever you want to use for testing)
- git config --global user.signingkey <key> (if you want to GPG sign)
